### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE helpdesk_support (
    request_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    request_description TEXT,
    request_status VARCHAR(50),
    request_priority VARCHAR(50),
    assigned_support_agent VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE helpdesk_support SET request_status='closed' WHERE request_id=1;
